snippet: Several film promotions have been canceled because of the Connecticut school shootings.
abstract: Several film promotions have been canceled because of the Connecticut school shootings.
lead_paragraph: The Newtown school killings have had reverberations in Washington, corporate America and now Hollywood. The Weinstein Company held a premiere party last in New York for “Django Unchained,” but the Los Angeles equivalent was canceled on Monday. It was one of several events, writes Brooks Barnes, being rethought because of “the mourning and emotional distress resulting from the Connecticut school massacre.” Read more »
